commands.title: Plainwind: Toggle Visual Enhancements In Detail Panel

walkthroughs.title: Get Started with Plainwind
walkthroughs.description: Learn how to use Plainwind to translate Tailwind classes to plain English

steps.title: Click any translation for details
steps.description:
Translations appear above your Tailwind classes as **CodeLens**.

**How it works:**
- Look for the translation text above `className` attributes
- Click any translation to open a detailed breakdown panel
- Panel shows categories, copy buttons, and enhanced visuals
- Multiple panels can be open for comparison

[Open Settings Menu](command:plainwind.showMenu)

media.markdown:
Look for translations above your Tailwind classes:

```jsx
// Layout: flex container, center items...
<div className="flex items-center justify-between">
```

**Click the translation to see full details!**

steps.title: Access all settings via status bar
steps.description:
Click the **～ Plainwind** item in the status bar (bottom-right corner) to quickly access all options.

**Available options:**
- Change display mode (CodeLens, Hover, Off)
- Toggle category grouping and emojis
- Adjust truncation length
- Enable visual enhancements
- Toggle for current file

[Open Settings Menu Now](command:plainwind.showMenu)

media.markdown:
Find the status bar item:

```
Bottom right corner: ～ Plainwind
                      ↑ Click here!
```

This opens the quick menu with all settings.

steps.title: Open multiple panels for comparison
steps.description:
Each translation you click opens a new panel as a tab. This lets you compare different Tailwind elements side-by-side.

**Features:**
- Each panel is a separate tab
- Switch between panels using VS Code tabs
- Copy buttons for classes and translations
- Close individual tabs or all at once
- Navigate back to source code

[Try it now!](command:plainwind.showMenu)

media.markdown:
**Workflow:**

1. Click first translation → Panel 1 opens
2. Click second translation → Panel 2 opens as tab
3. Click third translation → Panel 3 opens as tab
4. Switch between tabs to compare
5. Use "Close all tabs" button when done

steps.title: Choose your display mode
steps.description:
Plainwind offers three display modes to suit your preference:

**CodeLens** (default)
- Translations always visible above code
- Best for learning and quick reference

**Hover**
- Translations appear only on hover
- Cleaner editor, less visual noise

**Off**
- Disable all translations
- Keep extension installed for quick toggling

[Change Display Mode](command:plainwind.chooseDisplayMode)

media.markdown:
**CodeLens mode:**
```jsx
// Layout: flex container...
<div className="flex">
```

**Hover mode:**
```jsx
<div className="flex"> ← Hover to see
```

steps.title: Customize to your preferences
steps.description:
Plainwind is highly customizable:

**Truncation Length**
- Presets: Compact, Normal, Generous, Maximum
- Or set custom value (50-500 chars)

**Visual Options**
- Group by category (Layout, Colors, etc.)
- Show category emojis
- Visual enhancements (actual colors, fonts)

**File Control**
- Disable for specific files
- Quick toggle per file

[Open All Settings](command:plainwind.showMenu)

media.markdown:
**Quick settings:**
- Truncation: `Compact` `Normal` `Generous` `Maximum`
- Grouping: `✓ Enabled` or `○ Disabled`
- Emojis: `✓ Enabled` or `○ Disabled`
- Visuals: `✓ Enhanced` or `○ Plain text`

Access via status bar menu!

enumDescriptions: Always show translations above className lines
plainwind.displayMode.description: Choose how to display Tailwind translations

plainwind.groupByCategory.description: Group translations by category (Layout, Spacing, Colors, etc.)

plainwind.showCategoryEmojis.description: Show emojis next to category names (only works when 'Group By Category' is enabled)

plainwind.enhanceVisuals.description: Apply visual enhancements in the detail panel: color text with actual colors, show font weights and sizes visually, display spacing pixel values, apply opacity effects, preview border radius and shadows

plainwind.autoNavigateToHighlight.description: Automatically scroll the editor to show highlighted code when a panel is opened or focused

plainwind.codeLensMaxLength.description: Maximum characters before truncation (cutoff). Translations longer than this will be truncated with '...' and show 'Show full translation' link. Adjust based on your editor width.

plainwind.hasSeenClickableTip.description: Internal: tracks whether user has seen the clickable CodeLens tip
